name: Ice Cream Tycoon
description:
A classic tycoon game where the player can explore and upgrade a park while enticing customers to purchase ice cream. Includes an atmospheric scene you can upgrade to raise its appeal and attract more customers with.  The park starts empty and eventually becomes more immersive, appealing and populated as it upgrades.

Timeline of development:
Day 1 - Game idea conceptualization and feasibility test, simple level prototype

Day 2 - Expand on the level, place buildings,props and park upgrades

Day 3 - Created Customers, Behavior tree, Tasks and Navigation functionality

Day 4 - General AI debugging, tweaking, navigation optimization

Day 5 - Polish & Optimization pass, Menu and HUD debugging, optimizing packaging, compression, content & media creation

Game Instructions:

WASD Movement, Mouse to look around, Space to Jump

Pressing "B" brings up the build mode to upgrade the park

Pressing "P" Will quit the game 

Take your time to explore the area, initial sales are slow until you purchase a few upgrades and over time the park transforms to become more immersive and atmospheric . Hope you enjoy! Please leave a comment below, Tell me what you think, add suggestions, bug reporting or general comments :)
